title: My fps drop a lot while fighting the Elder Dragon, what can I do?
body:
This problem occurs only during fights at the Elder Dragon (it doesn't happen with the other dragons or Baron).
Is there any solution, apart from buying a new graphic card?

replies.body: There may be an issue with your computer rendering the Elder Dragon, and causing it to drop fps.  There are a few things you can try to resolve this like updating your graphics card or running a repair.  We have a detailed troubleshooting guide available in our [Low FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting).  Hope that helps!
